channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Opposition Lawmakers Postpone Trip to Contested Taiping Island
item.description: A group of opposition lawmakers have postponed their trip to Taiwanâ€™s outlying Taiping Island in the South China Sea citing weather concerns and a legislation vote the next day.

item.title: Chiayi Temple Holds Annual 'River Rush' Blessing Ceremony
item.description: Temple-goers in southern Taiwan carried deities into the river over the weekend in an annual event to bring prosperity and fortune to Chiayi County.

item.title: Thailand's Iconic Durian Fruit Hit by Unprecented Heat Wave
item.description: Farmers in Thailand struggle to harvest the popular, stinky durian fruit amid an unprecedented heat wave.

item.title: 8 Years of Struggle: Indigenous Land Reform Under Tsai
item.description: Tsai Ing-wen was the first president to apologize to Indigenous people for the oppression they faced under the government. TaiwanPlus spoke with NCCU professor of ethnology Daya Ku
